info.narration: #0 is going into $0's containment unit to begin the task.

collection.name: We Can Change Anything
collection.openText: Now everything will be just fine.

specialTipSize.specialTip: Place an employee inside the machine and it will continuously produce energy.
Once the employee is inside the machine, the employee will take Red damage. The employee inside cannot leave and will eventually die.
The amount of energy will increase as time goes by.
This Abnormality is not affected by the Qliphoth deluge.
